original: Hultgren, Knut Sven Folke, disponent, Ulricehamn, f. 13/1/02 i Ulricehamn av köpm. Sven H. o. Jenny Pettersson. G. 1. 25-40 m. Rut Sandström, 2. 42 m. Bojan Sjösten. Barn: Siv f. 2i8, Birgit 31, Sven 44. — Anst. v. A-B Ulricehamns Yllefabr. sed. 23, lagerchef där 25-40 o. därefter disp., deläg. i företaget sed. 25 o. led. av dess styr. sed. 40. Styr :led. i Timme-le Färgeri A-B sed. 42, huvudman i Ulricehamns Stads o. Redvägs Hds Sparbank sed. 46, stadsfullm. o. rev. f. stadens räkensk. 34-42, kyrkofullm. sed. 42. Medl. av Frim:orden o. Odd Fellow. Resa t. Tyskl. 22. Hobby: motorsport.
translated: Hultgren, Knut Sven Folke, manager, Ulricehamn, b. 13/1/02 in Ulricehamn to merchant Sven H. and Jenny Pettersson. Married 1st. in 1925 to Rut Sandström, divorced in 1940, married 2nd. in 1942 to Bojan Sjösten. Children: Siv b. 1928, Birgit b. 1931, Sven b. 1944. Employed by A-B Ulricehamns Yllefabr. since 1923, warehouse manager there from 1925-1940 and thereafter manager, part-owner of the company since 1925 and member of its board since 1940. Board member of Timme-le Färgeri A-B since 1942, chairman of Ulricehamns Stads o. Redvägs Hds Sparbank since 1946, member of the city council and auditor of the city's accounts from 1934-1942, church council member since 1942. Member of Freemasons and Odd Fellow. Traveled to Germany in 1922. Hobby: motorsport.

structured.name: Knut Sven Folke Hultgren

jobHistory.name: Ulricehamns Stads o. Redvägs Hds Sparbank

structured.description: Knut Sven Folke Hultgren was a Swedish manager and part-owner of A-B Ulricehamns Yllefabr. He was also a member of the board of Timme-le Färgeri A-B, chairman of Ulricehamns Stads o. Redvägs Hds Sparbank, and a member of the city council and church council of Ulricehamn. He had a hobby of motorsports and was a member of Freemasons and Odd Fellow.
